document.full_text: the federal commission on civil rights has shelved an investigation into gender bias in college admissions because of disagreements over the quality of data subpoenaed from 19 colleges.
document.title: education: gender bias inquiry put aside
lines_and_colors: the federal commission on civil rights has shelved an investigation into gender bias in college admissions because of disagreements over the quality of data subpoenaed from 19 colleges.
